image.caption: Collection of the U.S. House of Representatives

profileText: a Representative from Oklahoma; born in Chickasha, Grady County, Okla., June 9, 1976; graduated from Chickasha High School, Chickasha, Okla., 1994; B.A., University of Tulsa, Tulsa, Okla., 1998; J.D., Southern Methodist University, Dedman School of Law, Dallas, Tex., 2001; lawyer, private practice; staff, United States Representative Brad Carson of Oklahoma, 2004-2005; nonprofit executive; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Sixteenth Congress (January 3, 2019-January 3, 2021); unsuccessful candidate for reelection to the One Hundred Seventeenth Congress in 2020; unsuccessful candidate for election to the United States Senate in 2022.
